sample_text:
Coverage for AYUSH treatments in policies wherein medical expenses for non-
allopathic treatments were either excluded or not covered upto Sum Insured until 31st 
March 2024 
This is with reference to the circular on ‘Guidelines on providing AYUSH coverage in 
Health Insurance policies’ Ref. IRDAI/HLT/CIR/GDL/31/01/2024 issued by IRDAI 
dated 31st Jan 2024. 
Kindly note that to comply with the said circular, AYUSH (Ayurveda, Yoga and 
Naturopathy, Unani, Siddha and Homeopathy systems of medicines) treatments 
wherein In-patient care hospitalization for more than 24 hours is medically necessary
